original_title: Racer X - Live at the Whisky - Snowball of Doom
overview: Live at the Whisky: Snowball of Doom is the third live album by Racer X. It was recorded on May 25, 2001 at the Whisky a Go Go in West Hollywood, California at Racer X's first live concert since their hiatus. The concert was also recorded and released on DVD.
title: Racer X - Live at the Whisky - Snowball of Doom
